key.name: filemanager-integration
key.summary: Able to integration with file manager app
key.description: If enabled, it's able to integrate with file manager. If disabled, will not try to open up file manager in any case.

key.name: protect-non-media-mounts
key.summary: Hide the item and do not allowed eject or unmount if mount point is not under /media
key.description: If enabled, mounts which not mounted under /media will not allowed to eject or unmount.

key.name: protect-root-device-mounts
key.summary: Hide the item and do not allowed eject or unmount if the mount device provided root (/) mount point
key.description: If enabled, mounts which on the same device as root (/) mount will not allowed to eject or unmount.
